item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, October 12, 2024 at 2:40 AM UTC
item.description:

2. Started a guide to writing FUSE filesystems in Python (153 points | 35 comments)
3. Lm.rs: Minimal CPU LLM inference in Rust with no dependency (199 points | 46 comments)

25. Initial CUDA Performance Lessons (150 points | 36 comments)
26. INTELLECT–1: Launching the First Decentralized Training of a 10B Parameter Model (21 points | 2 comments)
